channel.title: [HELP] [PI] - How do i set up the theving stalls and receive xp
channel.description:
Ohaii there...
I'm having a problem. I'm using a cleaned Project Insanity source, and i'm wondering how i can make the stalls give xp when you steal from them. I've already added the stalls. Please help.
Thanks.

item.title: [HELP] [PI] - How do i set up the theving stalls and receive xp
item.dc:creator: @knucklescape knucklescape
item.source: [HELP] [PI] - How do i set up the theving stalls and receive xp

item.title: [HELP] [PI] - How do i set up the theving stalls and receive xp
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You have to set the stalls in your actionhandler.java

/*case 2561: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 5000, 10, 1); break;

the case is the id
the 995 is the itemid
the 5000 is the amount
the 1 is the requirement

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] [PI] - How do i set up the theving stalls and receive xp
